text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Hero III G731GV 17.3" FHD 144Hz | 2.6GHz i7-9750H, RTX 2060, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Starfield. The build quality of the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Hero III G731GV 17.3" FHD 144Hz | 2.6GHz i7-9750H, RTX 2060, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

A definite 5 stars!
